snippet.title: Tales of the Neon Sea - Gameplay Preview
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tales of the Neon Sea now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/828740/Tales_of_the_Neon_Sea/

Welcome to a world of intrigue and suspicion. Where humans and robots contend with escalating tensions and mutual distrust. And where gangster felines scheme their way to the top of the food chain. 

Tales of the Neon Sea is scheduled to release on April 30th for Steam.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZdcInteractive

Join our Discord for discussion: https://discord.gg/dRBr2ZF
